nodes.title: Fix Dagger compiler deps, update to Dagger 1.1.0
Update link to the ObjectGraph JavaDoc
Remove ViewPresenter's hard dependency on android.view.View
Fixes a small grammatical error in the readme file
Issue #178: Scoped interface to not allow nested onEnterScope/onExitScope calls.
fix lint checks by reverting to 1.2.3 plugin (1.3.1 and 1.5.0 are bad)
Note why getScope explicitly falls back to app context
If we don't find a scope, look in the app context
Throw valid exceptions on service lookup and build
Fixes crash when not specifying a @WithModule annotation with the ScreenScoper
Move to released version of Dagger2
fix(BundleServiceComparator): use ternary operator instead of Integer#compare() that requires API level 19
Add build files to build project with Gradle
Change generated name to be consistent with Dagger 2
fix(MortarScope) use application context in MortarScope#getScope()
fix(BundleServiceComparator): use ternary operator instead of Integer#compare() that requires API level 19
Use released Dagger 2 dependency instead of the snapshot.
Avoid unnecessary method traversing for DaggerService
When a scope ends throw away its bundle
DO NOT MERGE, wip: Mortar as service provider
No more ICS; catch samples up to flow 0.9, drop Blueprint
Remove old view and destroy scope concurrently in sample.
Fixes rough edges of new parent-based destroy scheme.
Don't bundle dagger-compiler or its deps (guava!)
Delay loading of of child scopes created during onload.
Snip naive RxJava brain damage in DemoApplication
Use getSystemService() to get the activity scope
Kill MortarContext in favor of getSystemService()
Dropping the view from Presenter#onDestroy was idiotic.
Child scope created during register() get state
Single onLoad call from scope created during onLoad
Dev: print scopes, dagger modules & entry points
Unregister view when replaced in Presenter
Some fixes for the new readme
View state hack is no longer needed
Updated docs and new sample app
Fixes rotation in sample app. Revealed necessary API changes.
Document use of WeakReference by Presenter
fixed release date of version 0.5 in changelog
No more getMortarScope() boilerplate on views.
Allow root scope to belong to activity.
Remove MortarContextWrapper from the public API
